entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
